typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'dp203',
	folderPath: 'synapse/workspaces/dp203asaworkspace/warehouse/blobdata',
	fileName: 'robbers_21.data.txt',
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> sourceRobbers
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> hasskills
